title: Kindly Identify the Font ;)
content:
Hello Every One,

The Picture quality is unfortunately not very good, as it is a copy of embroidery thread off a old paper & in yellow.  
Well I am able to see that it is similar somewhat to Calibri & Arial but not 100% accurate.  
With the help of you people, I hope that I will find the font.

Thanks in anticipation;  
Hasnain Munawar

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822143946im_/http:/typophile.com/files/joe_5214.jpg)
author: hasnain125

comments.content: Machine stitched font is very difficult to see clear forms - Try Helvetica.
